originalText.text: Im very satisfied with my experience here. Just walked in, and was seen fairly quickly. The place has order and a system going and it works. They are not invasive of information in order to see you and the staff were VERY personable. I felt at ease and like i was in good hands. I went between classes for routine tests and was in and out in a little over an hour.

originalText.text: Every person I interacted with was courteous and respectful. The clinic itself was clean and safe. The wait was reasonable. I had 2 tests done and was in and out in under 2 hours. This is an invaluable resource for nyc residents without health insurance and I commend the city for providing it. Thank you.

text.text: Every person I interacted with was courteous and respectful. The clinic itself was clean and safe. The wait was reasonable. I had 2 tests done and was in and out in under 2 hours. This is an invaluable resource for nyc residents without health insurance and I commend the city for providing it. Thank you.

originalText.text: This is the place to go if you are concerned about anything.  Immaculate facilities, ultra professional staff, short wait times between various testing/counseling, and fully capable of providing any vaccination required.  I went in because I was concerned about one thing, but ended up doing all the tests/shots.  Was in and out in 1:45. It is a NYC DoH clinic so services are free at the time but they ask you to pay afterwards on a sliding scale on the honor system tied to your income (which they do not verify).  Maximum requested payment is $50.  I was so pleased with everything that when I got home I could not put the $50 in the mail fast enough.  Near impossible to believe it is a public clinic, it's nicer than lots of private medical offices I have been in.

originalText.text: The comments here are right. The staff is nice, all of them.  I can't believe how caring, professional and efficient.  Management must be excellent.  The place has been renovated. Thumbs are to all of them!!!!

originalText.text: Clean and Friendly  got taken care of in quick reasonable time. Felt safe and well informed definitely recommend to others.
